Webcast Help FAQs and System Test Operating System Browser Bandwidth Slide Display Test Media Playback Test Click Play Advanced Info : User Agent View the minimum system requirements Operating System Windows 10 , Windows 8.1+ Pro , Android VERSION + , Apple Mac OS X VERSION . VERSION + , Apple iOS VERSION + Processor VERSION RAM VERSION Internet Browser Google Chrome: Current or previous 5 versions , Firefox: Current or previous 5 versions , Safari (Mac devices only): Current or previous 5 versions , Microsoft Edge: Current or previous 5 versions Hardware AUDIO: Sound Card with speakers VIDEO: Screen with VERSION + resolution support Media Playback HTML5 streaming enabled browser , Apple iOS http streaming enabled browser , Android http streaming enabled browser Internet Connection Dedicated high speed connection of VERSION Kbps+ I am having trouble hearing audio If you have internal speakers, make sure they aren't muted. If you have external speakers, make sure they are powered on and aren't muted. Make sure you did not lose Internet connectivity. Make sure your system has passed the system test located under "Test my system now". If you are using a mobile device, such as an iPhone, make sure you have enough bandwidth. We advise using dedicated wi-fi or 4G. If you are using an Android device, Apple iPad or iPhone you will need to click on the media play button to begin the presentation. Android and Apple iOS devices do not permit streams to begin automatically. If you are using an Android device, Apple iPad or iPhone you will need to click on the media play button to begin the presentation. --> A Javascript-enabled browser is required to view this page
